posts.postText:
Is fuffed up

It crashes on me randomly and now the backspace is not  owo  working anymore.

 Sujggestions?  Suggestions?

Try a different computer, if it gives you the same problems then it's the keyboard. If it dosn't re-install drivers and try a different usb port.

What keyboard is it? If it's a higher end keyboard just RMA it.

>> Try a different computer, if it gives you the same problems then it's the keyboard. If it dosn't re-install drivers and try a different usb port.

What keyboard is it? If it's a higher end keyboard just RMA it. 

Zboard Gaming Keyboard Steel Series

Wtf is this RMA?

Edited: Just  s  googled it,  its  i've had it for about 8-10 months  o  now, idk if thats going to work
If you cant use backspace, just use the delete key in the meantime. (It deletes forward, not backward)
